Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-PaymentReconciliation.allocation

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionSettlement particulars
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:identifier 0..1ExtensionBusiness identifier of the payment detail
value[x] 0..1IdentifierBusiness identifier of the payment detail
extension:predecessor 0..1ExtensionBusiness identifier of the prior payment detail
value[x] 0..1IdentifierBusiness identifier of the prior payment detail
extension:target 0..1ExtensionSubject of the payment
value[x] 0..1Reference(Claim | Account | Invoice | ChargeItem | Encounter | Contract)Subject of the payment
extension:targetItem[x] 0..1ExtensionSub-element of the subject
value[x] 0..1Sub-element of the subject
valueStringstring
valueIdentifierIdentifier
valuePositiveIntpositiveInt
extension:encounter 0..1ExtensionApplied-to encounter
value[x] 0..1Reference(Encounter)Applied-to encounter
extension:account 0..1ExtensionApplied-to account
value[x] 0..1Reference(Account)Applied-to account
extension:type 0..1ExtensionCategory of payment
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptCategory of payment
Binding: PaymentTypeCodes (extensible)
extension:submitter 0..1ExtensionSubmitter of the request
value[x] 0..1Reference(Practitioner | PractitionerRole | Organization)Submitter of the request
extension:response 0..1ExtensionResponse committing to a payment
value[x] 0..1Reference(ClaimResponse)Response committing to a payment
extension:date 0..1ExtensionDate of commitment to pay
value[x] 0..1dateDate of commitment to pay
extension:responsible 0..1ExtensionContact for the response
value[x] 0..1Reference(PractitionerRole)Contact for the response
extension:payee 0..1ExtensionRecipient of the payment
value[x] 0..1Reference(Practitioner | PractitionerRole | Organization)Recipient of the payment
extension:amount 0..1ExtensionAmount allocated to this payable
value[x] 0..1MoneyAmount allocated to this payable
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-PaymentReconciliation.allocation"

name: ext_R5_PaymentReconciliation_allocation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PaymentReconciliation.allocation for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PaymentReconciliation.allocation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PaymentReconciliation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.
